actions.name: CancelCluster
actions.description: Cancels a cluster job.

actions.name: CancelJob
actions.description: Cancels the specified job.

actions.name: CreateAddress
actions.description: Creates an address for a Snowball to be shipped to.

actions.name: CreateCluster
actions.description: Creates an empty cluster.

actions.name: CreateJob
actions.description: Creates a job to import or export data between Amazon S3 and your on-premises data center.

actions.name: CreateLongTermPricing
actions.description: Grants permission to creates a LongTermPricingListEntry for allowing customers to add an upfront billing contract for a job

actions.name: CreateReturnShippingLabel
actions.description: Creates a shipping label that will be used to return the Snow device to AWS.

actions.name: DescribeAddress
actions.description: Takes an AddressId and returns specific details about that address in the form of an Address object.

actions.name: DescribeAddresses
actions.description: Returns a specified number of ADDRESS objects.

actions.name: DescribeCluster
actions.description: Returns information about a specific cluster including shipping information, cluster status, and other important metadata.

actions.name: DescribeJob
actions.description: Returns information about a specific job including shipping information, job status, and other important metadata.

actions.name: DescribeReturnShippingLabel
actions.description: Information on the shipping label of a Snow device that is being returned to AWS.

actions.name: GetJobManifest
actions.description: Returns a link to an Amazon S3 presigned URL for the manifest file associated with the specified JobId value.

actions.name: GetJobUnlockCode
actions.description: Returns the UnlockCode code value for the specified job.

actions.name: GetSnowballUsage
actions.description: Returns information about the Snowball service limit for your account, and also the number of Snowballs your account has in use.

actions.name: GetSoftwareUpdates
actions.description: Returns an Amazon S3 presigned URL for an update file associated with a specified JobId.

actions.name: ListClusterJobs
actions.description: Returns an array of JobListEntry objects of the specified length.

actions.name: ListClusters
actions.description: Returns an array of ClusterListEntry objects of the specified length.

actions.name: ListCompatibleImages
actions.description: This action returns a list of the different Amazon EC2 Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) that are owned by your AWS account that would be supported for use on a Snow device.

actions.name: ListJobs
actions.description: Returns an array of JobListEntry objects of the specified length.

actions.name: ListLongTermPricing
actions.description: Grants permission to list LongTermPricingListEntry objects for the account making the request

actions.name: UpdateCluster
actions.description: While a cluster's ClusterState value is in the AwaitingQuorum state, you can update some of the information associated with a cluster.

actions.name: UpdateJob
actions.description: While a job's JobState value is New, you can update some of the information associated with a job.

actions.name: UpdateJobShipmentState
actions.description: Updates the state when a the shipment states changes to a different state.

actions.name: UpdateLongTermPricing
actions.description: Grants permission to update a specific upfront billing contract for a job
